summary: Ash must stop a hunter who forces the mythical Pokémon Celebi to help him destroy a forest.
cast: Rica Matsumoto|Veronica Taylor|Rachael Lillis|Ikue Ôtani|Unshô Ishizuka|Eric Stuart|Madeleine Blaustein|Mayumi Izuka|Yûji Ueda|Tomokazu Seki|Megumi Hayashibara|Tara Sands|Dan Green|Shin'ichirô Miki|Inuko Inuyama|Keiko Toda|Mami Koyama|Kerry Williams|Kayzie Rogers|Kazuko Sugiyama|Masahiko Tanaka|Roxanne Beck|Satomi Kôrogi|Amy Birnbaum|Mika Kanai|Ted Lewis|Yumi Tôma|Kôichi Sakaguchi|Stuart Zagnit|Katsuyuki Konishi|Rodger Parsons|Hisao Egawa|Michael Haigney|Akiko Suzuki|Ryôka Yuzuki|Tomoyuki Kôno|Shinichi Namiki|Masaru Motegi|Shirô Sano|Takashi Fujii|Anne Suzuki|Kôichi Yamadera|Marc Thompson
title: Pokémon 4Ever: Celebi, la voz del bosque
